reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Kambodzhan kansalaisyhteiskunnan ja valtiollisten toimijoiden osallistumisen vahvistaminen YK:n maaraaikaistarkastelumekanismissa
Strengthening the engagement of Cambodian civil society and state actors in the United Nations Universal Periodic Review mechanism

description.narrative: The overall goal of the project is to improve the human rights situation strengthen good governance and promote democracy in Cambodia by encouraging Cambodian civil society stakeholders to engage in the United Nations UPR mechanism and demand accountabilit y from the RGC for better fulfillment of its human rights obligations. The specific objectives are to strengthen the capacity and engagement of Cambodian civil society actors including CSOs HRDs activists and the media state stakeholders and member states throughout the process of the mid-term review of the third UPR cycle and the upcoming fourth UPR cycle in 2024; and to increase awareness among the Cambodian public to the UPR mechanism so that they can demand the implementation of the UPR recommendations to the RGC.

The overall goal of the project is to improve the human rights situation strengthen good governance and promote democracy in Cambodia by encouraging Cambodian civil society stakeholders to engage in the United Nations UPR mechanism and demand accountabilit y from the RGC for better fulfillment of its human rights obligations. The specific objectives are to strengthen the capacity and engagement of Cambodian civil society actors including CSOs HRDs activists and the media state stakeholders and member states throughout the process of the mid-term review of the third UPR cycle and the upcoming fourth UPR cycle in 2024; and to increase awareness among the Cambodian public to the UPR mechanism so that they can demand the implementation of the UPR recommendations to the RGC.
